title: Pizzeria Lunda Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has an impressive and extensive vegan menu with a large variety of faux meats: chicken, soy mince, ham, kebab, tuna, shrimp, soy steak, gyros and sausages. Also has soy cheese. Vegan pizzas, wraps and different vegan sauces like Bearnaise sauce, garlic sauce and hummus, as well as falafel. Located in central Lund very near Botulfsplatsen bus station.
